name: Death and Taxes (itch) (nwarcord)
description:
Game was created in two days for an internet programming class and was a first foray into JavaScript. The project was rebuilt in Godot as a means to experiment with the engine. Inspiration came from Lucas Pope's Papers, Please and credit for PrimusFont goes to Katharina Putick.

It is simple, short, and not worth any money. Yet, I am still proud of the small toy I made and hope it interests someone (or sparks critique from someone).

Enjoy.
